title: The Story of diplomacy
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, John Martin-Jones and Ian Dunlop
brief_description: Traces the history of diplomacy from the days of early Greek and Egyptian civilization. The establishment of resident ambassadors abroad, the introduction of congresses and the “balance of power”, the revolt against secrecy after World War I, resulting in the League of Nations and later the United Nations. Emphasises the continuing importance of individual negotiations. Narrated by Alastair Duncan.
